hints.content: Each tick mark on the number line represents one minute.

$7{:}50$ is $50$ minutes after $7{:}00$. 


[[☃ image 1]]

So, we move $50$ tick marks past $7{:}00$.

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 7:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 8:00.  The tick mark at 50 is labeled 7:50. A blue line moves right along the number line from 7:00 to 7:50. !

hints.content:
This number line shows $7{:}50$ graphed:



[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 7:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 8:00. The 50 tick mark is labeled A. !

question.content:
**On which number line is $7{:}50$ graphed?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 7:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 8:00. The 50 tick mark is labeled A. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/de2e8c4c894e7810a7e321f2f2642b67d623062b)

![A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 7:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 8:00.  The fifth tick mark after 50 is labeled B. ](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8406b0ef0b78af035b99ccc2a65395dcd0f16afe)

![A number line labeled 0 to 60 with tick marks every 1 unit. The 0 tick mark is also labeled 6:00 and the 60 tick mark is also labeled 7:00. The 50 tick mark is labeled C.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/db622dc54c7af42eb1d6b6cfe4d5ca5d3b4640f9)
